original_text: Hearken unto me, my people; and give ear unto me, O my nation: for a law shall proceed from me, and I will make my judgment to rest for a light of the people.
korean_text: 내 백성이여 내게 주의하라 내 나라여 내게 귀를 기울이라 이는 율법이 내게서부터 나갈 것임이라 내가 내 공의를 만민의 빛으로 세우리라

sentences.original_text: and give ear unto me, O my nation
for a law shall proceed from me
and I will make my judgment to rest
for a light of the people
